article.title: Constraint on the black-hole spin of M87 from the accretion-jet model

multiple_choice_question.text: This figure shows the spectral energy distribution (SED) of M87, fitted with an ADAF-jet model. What does the dotted line represent?
choices: Total spectrum of ADAF and jet.

multiple_choice_question.text: Table 1 shows the parameters derived from the hybrid ADAF-jet model for different black hole spin values (a*).  What does the parameter Î· represent?
